箵字的基本解释

箵
xīng
〔笭箵〕见“
笭”。

箵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xǐng］
［《廣韻》蘇挺切，上迥，心。］
渔人盛鱼用的竹器。

箵字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　箵； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页890第23
【廣韻】蘇挺切【集韻】所景切【韻會】【正韻】息井切，?音省。【廣韻】笭箵，篝籠。　又【集韻】銑挺切，音醒。笭箵，車笭也。　又先靑切，音星。【大唐新語】漁具總曰笭箵。○按《元結傳》自釋語：能帶笭箵，全獨而保生。能學聱齖，保宗而全家。按語皆協韻，故箵音平聲，與生相協。又《蘇舜欽·松江觀漁》詩：鳴榔莫觸蛟龍睡，舉網時聞魚鼈腥。我實宦遊無况者，擬來隨爾帶笭箵。又陸游、黃庭堅、秦觀、陶宗儀詩，笭箵皆作平聲，入九靑韻。

箵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
箵字的起名意思

暂无。

箵
Basic explanation of words
箵
xīng
[笭箵] See "
笭".
箵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xǐng］
["Guangyun" Su Ting cut, Shang Jiong, heart. ]
Bamboo utensils used by fishermen to hold fish.
箵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo characters department] 　箵; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 890 23
[Guangyun] Su Tingqi [Jiyun] Suojingqi [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Xijingqi, sound province. [Guangyun] 笭箵, camp cage.　[Jiyun] The milling is quite cut, the sound is awake.笭箵, car 笭 also.　Cut again first, Yinxing. [Datang New Words] Fishing tackle is called 笭箵. ○According to "Yuan Jie Biography" self-explanatory words: can bring a 笭箵, all alone and save alive. Able to learn, protect the family and the whole family. The notes are all in conjunction with rhyme, so the sound of the 箵 sound is flat, and is in harmony with the life. Another poem of "Su Shunqin·Songjiang Watching Fish": Do not touch the dragon to sleep when beating, and smell the fish and turtle when lifting the net. I am a person who travels without any conditions, and I plan to come with you to bring the banquet. In the poems of Lu You, Huang Tingjian, Qin Guan, and Tao Zongyi, the 笭箵 is a flat sound and enters the nine-sounding rhyme.
